Description: Two joined fragments of upper part of black figure painted pottery situla. Bird with raised wing. Purple on feathers.
Curator's comments: Attributed by Cook to his situla Group C (no. C26)
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 604, 10)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 266)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.210)
